content.question: The “woes” referred to in the first sentence of the passage are best explained as part of which of the following developments?

choices.label: The large number of orphans after the wars against Napoleon
The increase in family sizes as a result of agricultural improvements
The increase in political radicalism after the French Revolution
The large increase in urban populations during the Industrial Revolution

content.answer: The large increase in urban populations during the Industrial Revolution

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
